data.text:
STIGA is a purpose-driven Group. As stated by CEO Sean Robinson, “We are focused on being a reliable partner for our customers by helping them to create, nurture and enjoy their own outdoor areas. Sustainability remains central to how we deliver this.” You can now browse the advancement on STIGA’s sustainability path in the new Sustainability Report: https://lnkd.in/eSiEfJAz #WeAreSTIGA #CorporateValues #CorporateCulture #NatureBasedSolutions #SustainabilityMatters #GreenerTogether

We are excited to announce that STIGA is now the official groundskeeping partner of European top team, the German football club Bayer 04 Leverkusen! STIGA will take care of Bayer 04 Leverkusen’s training pitches, providing superior lawn care and the best possible turf conditions by using the innovative STIGA autonomous robot lawnmowers. The partnership, running until 2025, represents both partners’ winning mentality, which is as important in sport as it is in business. Marc Gerster, Managing Director of STIGA Germany and Switzerland commented with enthusiasm: "With its innovative style of play, Bayer 04 Leverkusen has shaped football in Germany and demonstrated how you can be successful with courage, enthusiasm and passion. At STIGA we live by these values every day. This is why we look forward to bringing our horsepower onto the pitch”. Starting from the 2024/25 season, look up for STIGA on the LED boards at BayArena! #WeAreSTIGA #CorporateValues #CorporateCulture #Bayer04

True autonomy in your garden is now reality. Manage your STIGA robot mower with a single click, from your smartphone or smart home with the STIGA.GO App. Mastering the art of impeccable and healthy lawn care is as simple as downloading an app. Read about it all, here: #STIGAGuides #STIGAExpert #STIGATechnology

Vacation time is supposed to be a moment to unwind and recharge. But in today's constantly connected world, it's easy to find yourself glued to your phone, checking work emails, and feeling anything but relaxed. In this post, our HR team offers you three key tips to help you truly disconnect from work during your vacation. #HRTips #Careers #TheRightPlaceToBe

STIGA’s investment in sport continues because teamwork and a winning mentality are as important in business as they are in a soccer game. We are excited to show you what has happened this month during the SK Rapid vs. AC Milan match in Austria. Our electric tractors and autonomous robotic mowers were shown on the 240-metre LED screen at the Vienna West Stadium, reaching thousands of fans and viewers on ORF, the Austrian national public broadcaster. What's next? Europa League qualification on August the 1st, at 8:30pm. Stay tuned and look up for STIGA! #WeAreSTIGA #CorporateValues #CorporateCulture #STIGAAustria

Another step towards continuous improvement for STIGA! Our Lean & Process Engineering team, after achieving the MTM technical certification from the MTM Association, is completing the second step of practicum with UAS (Universal Analyzing System) and EAWS (Ergonomic Assessment Worksheet) certifications. The course, integrated with a plan to unify Work Analysis and Process Engineering, will elevate even more the team’s work method according to the highest standards. #WeAreStiga #CorporateCulture #Innovation

STIGA is committed to progressively replacing petrol-powered products with battery-powered alternative machines, with the aim of reducing the environmental impact of its products sold in the market. STIGA robot mowers are part of this vision. Have a look at our full range here: https://lnkd.in/dUszkdrg With zero gas emissions, STIGA Robots help reducing air and noise pollution, and help cultivate a healthier lawn. Robots trim a little at a time, which is less stressful for the grass than bigger cuts and nourish the soil by leaving the tiny clippings to mulch into the soil. #STIGATechnology #Innovation #NatureBasedSolutions #SmartHomes

Getting the right level of detail is crucial for success in any task. At STIGA we believe simplification of how we do things brings transparency and, with that, focus. Here are our HR tips on how to enhance your attention to detail, helping you catch minor errors, improve productivity, and achieve excellence in all your endeavors. #HRTips #Careers #TheRightPlaceToBe

This week, we had the pleasure of hosting the French Castorama retail network at our headquarters in Castelfranco Veneto (TV). The visitors spent the day with our STIGA engineers & salesmen, testing and reviewing products and learning about the newest solutions. Last but not least, the tour of the production facilities was a great occasion to see first-hand how and where our innovations are made. We thank again our partners for visiting us, it has been a valuable opportunity for business development and knowledge sharing that we hope to replicate again in the near future. #WeAreSTIGA #CorporateValues #CorporateCulture #STIGAFrance

STIGA goes into the field. June was a special month for the Marketing department. Part of the HQ’s team travelled to Germany to meet Nico Dietsch and his wife Bianca from the dealer Kortenbrede GmbH. It was a precious opportunity of knowledge sharing and an unmissable chance to collect their direct feedbacks and experience regarding our STIGA autonomous robots. A big thanks to our German partners for their kind hospitality and cooperation! #STIGATechnology #Innovation #STIGAWorldwide
